entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023
